name: Boxes in boxes
description:
Task ##### "Given a positive integer n, return a string representing the box associated with it." - Boxes can get huge fast, so range of n is 1 - 20 (upper limit included/excluded depending on language). - Rows are delimited by a newline '\n' and all rows have same length. - Make sure to include the corrrect amount of leading and trailing whitespace where necessary. - Characters used in box: '|', '_', ' '. - Keep an eye out on performance of your solution. - Code length limited to 2000 characters to prevent hardcoding.
Puzzle Can you figure out the pattern and extend boxes for n > 4? ``` --------------------------------- n box height width --------------------------------- _ 1 |_| 2 3 _ _ 2 | _| 3 5 |_|_| _ _ _ 3 | _| 5 7 | _|_| | | _| |_|_|_| _ _ _ _ 4 | _| 9 9 | _|_| | | _| | _|_|_| | | _| | | _|_| | | | _| |_|_|_|_| ```
Alignment In the example below, whitespace is replaced by '*' to give an idea where to draw whitespace. ``` *_*_*_* |****_| |**_|_| |*|**_| |_|_|_| ```
Good luck!
